column1: '''''Vinyar Tengwar''''' '''45''' is the forty-fifth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal of the  [[Elvish Linguistic Fellowship]], devoted to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
* "Addenda and Corrigenda to [[the Etymologies]]" — Part One — [[Carl F. Hostetter]] and [[Patrick H. Wynne]]
** '''The above article is previously unpublished primary material from the Tolkien archives.'''
::''The content list above only contains published articles.''
